Package co.cask.cdap.test

This package contains the public classes for unit tests.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ApplicationManager
    Instance of this class is for managing deployed application.
    ArtifactManager
    An interface to manage interactions with an artifact in tests.
    DataSetManager<T>
    Instances of this class are for managing Datasets.
    FlowManager
    Instance for this class is for managing a running Flow.
    MapReduceManager
    Instance for this class is for managing a running MapReduce.
    ProgramManager<T extends ProgramManager>
    Instance for this class is for managing a Id.Program.
    ScheduleManager
    This interface is for managing the schedule of a workflow
    ServiceManager
    Managing the running Service in an application.
    SlowTests
    Used to define unit-tests that could run for more than couple seconds, but usually less than 30 seconds.
    SparkManager
    Instance for this class is for managing a running Spark.
    StreamManager
    This interface helps to interact with streams.
    TestManager
    Class that provides utility methods for writing tests for CDAP Applications.
    WorkerManager
    Managing the worker in an application.
    WorkflowManager
    Workflow manager interface for managing the workflow and its schedules
    XSlowTests
    Used to define unit-tests that could run for more than 30 seconds
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractApplicationManager
    A base implementation of ApplicationManager.
    AbstractProgramManager<T extends ProgramManager>
    Abstract implementation of ProgramManager that includes common functionality for all implementations.
    AbstractTestManager
    Class that delegates deprecated methods to their non-deprecated counterparts, and delegates methods with fewer arguments to the one with more arguments.
    DefaultMapReduceManager
    A default implementation of MapReduceManager.
    DefaultSparkManager
    A default implementation of SparkManager.
    IntegrationTestBase
    Abstract class for writing Integration tests for CDAP.
    IntegrationTestManager
    TestManager for integration tests.
    MetricsManager
    Used by tests for querying metrics system.
    RemoteDatasetAdmin
    Remote implementation of DatasetAdmin.
    RevealingTxSystemClient
    A TransactionSystemClient that creates transaction objects with additional fields for validation.
    RevealingTxSystemClient.RevealingTransaction
    This transaction class allows us to return additional details about the transaction to the client.
    SingletonExternalResource
    An ExternalResource that maintain a singleton to another ExternalResource so that it can be used in test suite as well as in individual test in the suite.
    TestBase
    Base class to inherit from for unit-test.
    TestConfiguration
    This class can be used to setup CDAP configuration for unit-test.
    UnitTestManager
    TestManager for use in unit tests.

Package co.cask.cdap.test Description

This package contains the public classes for unit tests.
